programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Underhanded real estate salesmen sink to varying levels of deceit in order to sell their dubious properties.

programme.title: The Road to Wellville
programme.desc: Dr. John Kellogg (Anthony Hopkins) treats a young couple (Bridget Fonda, Matthew Broderick) for their imagined ailments at his Michigan sanitorium circa 1907.

programme.title: Affliction
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff (Nick Nolte) becomes unhinged, thanks in part to his abusive, alcoholic father (James Coburn).

programme.title: Across the Tracks
programme.desc: A reform-schooled teen (Rick Schroder) and his college-bound brother (Brad Pitt) become rival high-school runners.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man: Director's Cut
programme.desc: A scientist uses an intellectually disabled gardener as a guinea pig in his experiments with intelligence enhancing drugs and virtual reality. The man transforms into a genius, but not without side effects.

programme.title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
programme.desc: An evil corporation planning an inescapable global computer network hires a mentally impaired laborer (Matt Frewer) made into a genius by virtual reality.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Keanu Reeves) turns California surfer to nab bank robbers who wear rubber masks of four ex-presidents.

programme.title: Bloodfist VII: Manhunt
programme.desc: A former special-forces agent (Don "The Dragon" Wilson) finds himself embroiled in police corruption and accused of murder.

programme.title: Unlawful Entry
programme.desc: A creepy policeman (Ray Liotta) gets close to a Los Angeles couple (Kurt Russell, Madeleine Stowe) in order to drive them apart.

programme.title: Manos, the Hands of Fate
programme.desc: While on a desert excursion, a family encounters cultists who use human hands as sacrificial offerings to their god.

programme.title: The Super
programme.desc: Ordered to live among his tenants in squalor, a New York slumlord (Joe Pesci) does so and sees the light.

programme.title: The Last Seduction
programme.desc: An insurance executive (Linda Fiorentino) skips town with drug money and stops at nothing to get what she wants.

programme.title: Clockwatchers
programme.desc: Friendship helps make nightmarish office jobs bearable for four young women working as temporary employees.
